qas.question: What alumni member also write the bestseller Before I Fall?

context: In literature, author of the New York Times bestseller Before I Fall <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2><b8_0>Lauren Oliver<b8_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>, Pulitzer Prize winning novelist <a1_0><a1_1><a1_2>Philip Roth<a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/>, Canadian-born Pulitzer Prize and Nobel Prize for Literature winning writer <b5_0>Saul Bellow<b5_0/>, political philosopher, literary critic and author of the New York Times bestseller "The Closing of the American Mind" <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><b6_0>Allan Bloom<b6_0/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/>, ''The Good War" author <a3_0><a3_1><a3_2><b7_0><b9_0>Studs Terkel<b9_0/><b7_0/><a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/>, American writer, essayist, filmmaker, teacher, and political activist Susan Sontag, analytic philosopher and Stanford University Professor of Comparative Literature Richard Rorty, and American writer and satirist <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2>Kurt Vonnegut<a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/> are notable alumni.
